articles.description: Since the iPhone 11 series, Apple has been offering ‘Pro’ and ‘non-Pro’ models of its flagship smartphones. The major differences between these models

articles.author: Matthew Loh
articles.title: Apple ordered to pay man $1,000 for not selling charger with iPhone - Insider
articles.description: The Brazilian judge ruled that the practice was a "tie sale," in which a company makes a customer buy two of its products so one can work fully.
articles.content:
A Brazilian judge has ordered Apple to pay 5,000 Brazilian reals, or $1,081, to a man for not including a power adapter with the sale of his new iPhone.
Judge Vanderlei Caires Pinheiro of a civil co… [+1626 chars]
